core:messageResource.core:message: Payment Service Global Payments Messages
Connecting to payment provider...
Connection to payment provider established.
Transaction approved.
Transaction declined.
Please ask the customer to insert or swipe their card.
Card error.
Card processing error.
Please ask the customer to remove their card from the reader.
Re-trying...
Please, ask the customer to present their card.
Please, ask the customer to remove and re-insert card.
Card not supported. Please, ask the customer to use a different card.
Please, instruct the customer to only present a single card.
Processing. Please, wait...
Bad swipe. Please, ask the customer to try again or use a different card.
The card has expired. Please, ask the customer to use a different card.
The card has been declined. Please, ask the customer to use a different card.
Please, ask the customer to enter PIN.
Please, ask the customer to enter the cashback amount.
The PED is out of paper.
Calling TMS to update the PED...
Transaction cannot be cancelled from POS at this point. Please, cancel at PED.
Authorisation code not available.
